Recently, an incredible thing happened on Twitter: a Twitter user's father raised money on Shuidichou because of cerebral hemorrhage.
However, just because she forgot to add a respectful term for the General Secretary when she posted a tweet to express her feelings, she was regarded as a traitor and reported by a pink fan. Shuidichou was shut down and the donations could not be withdrawn.

In Hunan TV's latest cross-strait song variety show "Sounds Never StopÂ·Treasure Island Season", when playing the clip of singer Ai Yiliang winning the Golden Melody Award, perhaps because there were too many people in the audience who were politically sensitive or had Westernized lifestyles, the program actually censored all the people in the audience.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
It is said that some young people in Shanghai made a T-shirt to commemorate the survivors of the Shanghai lockdown and sold it. On the evening of the 16th, according to the sales records, the people who bought the clothes were knocked on the door one by one and taken away by the police. Today, the search for the people who bought the clothes continued during the day, but only the clothes were taken away.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
On the 17th, in Ya'an, Sichuan, a villager said that two of his puppies were killed by several people and put into bags and taken away.
The township government staff said that because a case of rabies was found in the village, all dogs were killed according to regulations, and dogs cannot be kept for three years.
